backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling public contact form submissions, adminâ€‘restricted submission viewing, and user profile read/write with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report stub with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend files used as reference metadata.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the SPA root and loading main.tsx with favicon metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring scroll navigation and rendering all layout sections with refs.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders SolviroStudio logo image with crisp scaling and configurable height.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, quick links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/GradientButton.t: Styled gradient CTA button wrapper extending the base Button component.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section with intro text, team image, value cards, and Learn More CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClientR: Displays a results showcase with image cards and a CTA button using provided callback.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with email, phone info, validation states, and submission via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the main hero banner with headline, subtext, and a start button callback.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows a grid of portfolio campaign cards with metrics and a button to view the full portfolio.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service offerings with icons and a CTA button to explore more.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays client testimonials in a grid of styled cards.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll detection and smooth section navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling via AuthClient.
Custom hook that submits a contact form through an actor, tracking submitting, success, and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes including brand gradients and logo styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, requirements, and state for building a long-scroll SolviroStudio portfolio site with brand guidelines and section specifications.
